Autumnal Glory Festival

1
Maetriks
Saturday, September 16th, 2017, 8:24:55 AM

The Alliance of High Elven Society, along with several wonderful MHOs and CHEs, will be hosting the inaugural run of the Autumnal Glory Festival the first weekend of October, 10/6 - 10/8, in Ta'Vaalor. We'll open with a parade sponsored by House Aspis, and featuries float submissions from House Paupers and House Sovyn, with special guest Kayse, House Aspis's 5117 Bardfest winner. There will be both a costumed ball (which also serves as the date setting for our Blind Date Auction) and a harvest feast to close out the festival. Check out our GSWiki page for events times and details.
